text: what's it like attending an online
conference
well when we started adapting ndc
conferences to work as online events
we knew that what makes nbc special is
conversation sure we always work really
hard to put together a great program of
talks sessions panels and workshops
but what keeps people coming back year
after year is conversation
and energy and the excitement that you
get when people get together to share
their ideas
we wanted to get people together online
give them a chance to catch up with old
friends
make some new friends to let those kinds
of conversations happen
we figured if we got that part right the
rest would probably work itself out
now we know people in tech you're busy
you don't want to learn another chat
system or install another app
but we figured a lot of people in tech
are using slack already
what if we could use slack as an online
conference venue and so that's what we
did for nbc copenhagen
porto melbourne minnesota even nbc oslo
that's our flagship conference back in
june we had
nearly a thousand online attendees so
every ndc event gets a dedicated slack
workspace
if you're in the slack you're at the
conference that's how it works
and we know you don't want another slack
hanging around forever so when the
conference is over
we delete it shut it down if you weren't
there you missed it
sessions are held on webex zoom youtube
or twitch you can connect to those live
ask questions chat to the speakers chat
to the attendees
it's a it's a conference with no jet lag
a conference where nobody loses their
luggage there's no
cues for the coffee machine or worrying
if there's going to be enough vegetarian
food at lunch time
it's a slack workspace where you can
talk direct with great speakers
amy kaepernick and ian cooper amber
vandenberg
jimmy bogard it's a conference where we
beam workshops directly to your desk so
you don't have to
worry about whether you packed your
laptop charging cable
you can try and catch something in every
session get the full ndc experience
or you can cherry pick the bits that you
want to see add a little twist of ndc
into your working day
well that's nbc sydney 12th to the 16th
of october and it's 100
online check it out at nbc.com
and we'll see you there
[Music]
